taxNumber.description: Account owner tax number. Can be CPF or CNPJ (only numbers). Send only if the recipient doesn't have a pixKey.

name.description: Account owner name. Send only if the recipient doesn't have a pixKey.

paymentInstitutionId.description: Primary identifier of the institution associated to the payment recipient. Send only if the recipient doesn't have a pixKey.

pixKey.description: Pix key associated with the payment recipient
